description: Point 3. The missing link: is there also a modelling flaw? Where I notice that we have digital editions of "Texts" and digital editions of "documents", but no editions that link them (digital scholarly editions), and suspect that may be a flaw in our modelling of textual primary sources.

is_part_of.title: Opinion/Provocation: Why are there no digital scholarly editions of "classical" texts?

title: Point 3. The missing link: is there also a modelling flaw?
